idea:
a professional bag manufacturer, passionate in customized development for customers across industries.

Founded in 2019, GARISHTHA VENTURES PRIVATE LIMITED began as ODM manufacturer for outdoor sports items for Domestic  customers. Over the past tow years, with quality customer service, production on-time delivery and promptness in communication, GARISHTHA VENTURES PRIVATE LIMITED accumulates solid experience in developing customized products and mass production. We are committed to provide the quality products and solutions to customer. We continue to present our design idea or concept every year for our customerâ€™s reference. Buyers or designers only need bring their ideas to us, GARISHTHA VENTURES PRIVATE LIMITED is capable of realizing it into real products to the market. GARISHTHA VENTURES PRIVATE LIMITED is welcome to all different types of customers, either you are a professional brand, a chain store, an importer or even you are a start-up company or designer. We will always offer our professional suggestion and passion to every customer to realize the design concept together. To make the customer dream come true.

idea:
ThinkRenta.Com Is A Leading Online Furniture And Appliances Rental Store in Mumbai | Thane | Navi Mumbai | Dombivali (Palava) | Pune.

We have rental furniture & appliances services in place for both budget-friendly homes and exclusive homes.


We, ThinkRenta.Com are here to help find something for every room in your home with ease and affordability hassles of repair, relocation, and depreciation are of the past. Think about the ample amount of money you will spend while buying furniture and appliances and think about the plentiful amount of money you will save by renting.


The minimum tenure is of 03 months and a maximum tenure of 24 months you can renew at the end of the contract. The Best Furniture & Appliances Rental in Mumbai | Thane | Navi Mumbai | Dombivali (Palava) | Pune.
